title: Validator.pizza API
subtitle: Example API Documentation for the Validator.pizza disposable Email Checker API.

base.info: All Endpoints only support GET Requests . No POST, PUT or DEELETE Requests please.

auth: This API doesn't require any Authentication.
limits: The number of request is limited to 120 requests per hour, per IP address. I wanted to make it unlimited, but some people like to go wild, so I had to set a limit to guarantee the good functionality for everyone. If you need a higher limit, please contact me on Twitter. All IPs sending excessive requests will be banned.

contact.info: If you need help using this API, please don't hesistate to contact me on Twitter.

endpoints.name: Validate an email
endpoints.text: Detect if an Email is disposable or not.

endpoints.name: Validate a domain
endpoints.text: Detect if a Domain is used for disposable Email Addresses.
